c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowScore
c:functionType.c:documentation: The function type for scoring individual data according to some criteria. The default function returns the value of the given datum.

c:returns.c:documentation: The score of the element. If an element is to be removed it should return null. The value returned by the scoring function should be coherent with the scoring value expected by the select function, ; For the default select function defined it should return some numeric or date value.

c:functionType.name: SlidingWindowSelect
c:functionType.c:documentation: The function to select which data to remove given a set of datums. The default function removes all datums outside the sliding window interval; if the returned value is not numeric or a Date, the function doesn't remove the datum, since the value has no meaning in this context.

c:argument.name: allData
c:argument.c:documentation: The set of data to evaluate.

c:argument.name: remove
c:argument.c:documentation: An array to store the data to remove
